marklogic.body:
To all those Bleeding-heart liberals who are fulminating against Venky Vembu's article on why India should not support the resolution, this article should come as a wake-up call for you and the Indian Government. The message being conveyed is this:
Abdicate your responsibility and you risk having your rightful place in the region usurped by an outsider who is trying to Oust you.
By voting against Sri Lanka, we run the risk of alienating the only country in the region who is supporting us.
